name: Across Flash
description: Across Flash is an arcade style shooter glider VR game developed by Uborm Technology Inc. You will guide one of two unique fighter crafts and explore a once great civilization that has fallen to ruin. Fly and battle through desolate arctic extremes, blustering desert ruins, scalding lava relic, or alien ecology.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7+ Processor: Intel i7-4970 Memory: 4048 MB RAM Graphics: GTX970 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7+ Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 8096 MB RAM Graphics: GTX970+ Storage: 1 GB available space
